## isWebSocketProtocol() function

Check if context is WebSocket protocol

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function isWebSocketProtocol(ctx: KoattyContext): ctx is KoattyContext & {
    protocol: 'ws' | 'wss';
    websocket: NonNullable<KoattyContext['websocket']>;
};
```
